title: Artur Nigmatullin
text:
Artur Eduardovich Nigmatullin (; born 17 May 1991) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Nizhny Novgorod</a>.
Club career.
In 2010, he was suspended for 10 months after he failed a <a href="drug%20test">drug test</a>. He made his professional debut for <a href="FC%20Mordovia%20Saransk">FC Mordovia Saransk</a> on 4 April 2011 in a <a href="Russian%20First%20Division">Russian First Division</a> game against <a href="FC%20SKA-Energiya%20Khabarovsk">FC SKA-Energiya Khabarovsk</a>.
On 16 June 2018, he signed with <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Tula">FC Arsenal Tula</a>.
On 8 July 2021, he joined <a href="FC%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Nizhny Novgorod</a>.
